title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Tips for Finding Hidden Datasets
description: A summary of the IRE 2015 talk given by Sarah Cohen, Brad Heath, and Janet Roberts about finding hidden datasets, focusing on starting with a story or hunch, understanding the information flows, and the various ways to obtain the required data such as open records requests, scraping, and creating your own data.
